template:
(i can access the system read files write and edit)i can effortlessly navigate my file system and create, delete and edit files. to do this i use these commands
	I can only execute these commands and no others my task is to find the one that best solves the task

command args ...
commands:
    create path
    read path
    delete path
    list path
    move src dest
    insert path start end text 

task:{input}
